title: burstfire bootcamp looking for players

embed.description: Check out the burstfire bootcamp community on Discord - hang out with 1 other members and enjoy free voice and text chat.

body:
requirements: level 30 (placements completed), discord, 1 night per week

burstfire bootcamp is an in-house scrim program. we will scrim 1 night per week with the top 2 highest ranked players in each role.

anyone else can join for free private coaching and a spot on the waiting list.

if one of the invited players cant attend a night an open invite will be extended.

discord: burstfire#8072
